verses.text: NA‘E ai ha tangata ‘i he fonua ko ‘Usa na‘e hingoa ko Siope; pea na‘e haohaoa ‘a e tangata ko ia mo angatonu, pea na‘e ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua mo afe mei he kovi.
Pea na‘e fanau‘i kiate ia ha foha ‘e toko fitu mo ha ‘ōfefine ‘e toko tolu.

Pea ko ‘ene monumanu ko e sipi ‘e fitu afe, mo e kāmeli ‘e tolu afe, mo e taulua‘i pulu ‘e nimangeau, mo e ‘asi fefine ‘e toko nimangeau, pea ai mo ha kau nofo‘anga tokolahi; ko ia na‘e tomo hake ia ‘i he kakai ‘o Hahake kātoa.
Pea hanga hono ngaahi foha ‘o fai ha kātoanga ‘i honau ngaahi fale, takitaha ‘i hono ‘aho; ‘o nau fekau atu hono tala ki honau tuofāfine ‘e toko tolu, ke ha‘u ‘o kai mo inu mo kinautolu.

Pea ‘i he faifai pea kuo foki tu‘o taha honau ‘aho kātoanga, pea fekau ‘e Siope ke fai honau fakatāpui, ‘o ne tu‘u hengihengi hake, ‘o ne feia ‘a e ngaahi feilaulau-mōifua, ‘o fakatatau ki honau tokolahi; he na‘e pehē ‘e Siope, Na‘a kuo angahala ‘eku fānau, ‘o nau tafuli loto mei he ‘Otua. Na‘e pehē ‘a e fai ‘a Siope ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho ko ia kotoa.
Pea faifai pea hoko ‘a e ‘aho na‘e omi ai ‘a e ngaahi foha ‘o e ‘Otua ke hā kia Sihova, pea ha‘u ‘a Sētane foki ‘i honau lotolotonga.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Sētane, Ko ho‘o ha‘u mei fē? Pea tali ‘e Sētane kia Sihova, ‘o pehē, Mei he ‘alu fano ‘i māmani, mo ‘a‘ahi holo ai.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Sētane, Kuo ke tokanga‘i ‘a ‘eku tamaio‘eiki ko Siope? ‘a e ‘ikai ha taha ‘i māmani ‘oku tatau mo ia? He ko e tangata haohaoa mo angatonu, ‘oku ‘apasia ki he ‘Otua mo afe mei he kovi.
Pea tali ‘e Sētane kia Sihova, ‘o ne pehē, He ‘oku ‘apasia ‘a Siope ki he ‘Afiona tu‘unga‘a pē?
‘Ikai kuo ke ‘aa‘i takai ia mo hono fale, mo e me‘a kotoa ‘oku ne ma‘u? Kuo ke tāpuaki‘i ‘a e ngāue ‘a hono nima, pea ko ‘ene monumanu ‘oku nau ‘ufi‘ufi ‘a e fonua.
Ka ko eni, ala atu mu‘a ki he‘ene ngaahi me‘a; pea tala atu te ne mātu‘aki tafuli meiate koe.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Sētane; Vakai, te ke fa‘iteliha ki he‘ene ngaahi me‘a kotoa; kae ‘ikai te ke ala kiate ia. Pea hū kitu‘a ‘a Sētane mei he ‘ao ‘o Sihova.
Pea ‘iloange ko e ‘aho ‘e taha ‘oku fai ‘e he‘ene fānau tangata mo fefine ‘enau kai mo inu kava ‘i he fale ‘o honau ta‘okete lele,
mo e ha‘u ha talafekau kia Siope, ‘o ne pehē, Na‘e fai ‘e he fanga pulu ‘enau toho palau, pea kaikai ‘a e fanga ‘asi ofi ki ai:
pea hifo mai ‘a e kau Sipa, ‘o ‘ave kinautolu; pea ko e kau ngāue kuo nau tāmate‘i ‘aki ‘a e mata ‘o e heletā: pea ko au toko taha tofu pē kuo u hao mai ke fakahā kiate koe.

Lolotonga ‘oku kei lea ‘a ē mo e ha‘u ē, ‘o ne pehē, Ne tō mei langi ‘a e afi ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘o fakamomofi ‘a e fanga sipi mo e kau ngāue, pea kuo nau ‘osi ai: pea ko au toko taha tofu pē kuo u hao mai ke fakahā kiate koe.

Lolotonga ‘oku kei lea ‘a ē mo e ha‘u ē, ‘o ne pehē, Ko e kau Kalitia na‘e fakamatatolu mai, pea nau ‘ohofia ‘a e fanga kāmeli, ‘o ‘ave, pea ko e kau ngāue kuo nau tāmate‘i ‘aki ‘a e mata ‘o e heletā: pea ko au toko taha tofu pē kuo u hao mai ke fakahā kiate koe.
‘I he kei lea ‘a ē na‘e ha‘u ē ‘o ne pehē, Ko ho‘o fānau tangata mo fānau fefine na‘e fai ‘enau kai mo inu kava ‘i he fale ‘o honau ta‘okete lele,

mo e ‘iloange na‘e tō mai ha matangi lahi mei he tu‘a toafa, ‘o ne taa‘i ‘a e tuliki ‘e fā ‘o e fale; pea na‘e hinga ia ki he fānau, pea kuo nau pekia: pea ko au toko taha tofu pē kuo u hao mai ke fakahā kiate koe.
Pea tu‘u ‘a Siope, ‘o ne hae hifo hono kofu, ‘o ne fakatekefua, ‘o ne tō lafalafa ‘o hū, ‘o ne pehē,
Na‘a ku hū telefua mai mei he manava ‘o ‘eku fa‘ē, pea te u foki telefua ki ai. Ko Sihova na‘a ne foaki, pea ko Sihova kuo ne to‘o atu; kae mālō‘ia ai pē ‘a e huafa ‘o Sihova.
‘I he ngaahi me‘a kotoa ko ia na‘e ‘ikai fai hala ‘a Siope, pea na‘e ‘ikai te ne tuku ha kovi ki he ‘Otua.
